Sentencas: In this work, the ionic conductivity and charge carriers of acceptor-doped sodium tantalate (NaTaO3) with perovskite structure were investigated at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Conduction properties of Ti-doped NaTaO3 at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: The Ta-site of NaTaO3 was doped with up to 20% titanium (Ti) with the conventional solid-state reaction method.
Titulo: Conduction properties of Ti-doped NaTaO3 at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: After calcination at 900 degrees C, samples nominally doped with 5, 10% Ti show X-ray diffraction (XRD) pattern of orthorhombic NaTaO3 only, while peaks of Na2Ti3O7 can be observed in those doped with 15, 20% Ti.
Titulo: Conduction properties of Ti-doped NaTaO3 at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: The conductivity of undoped, 5% Ti and 10% Ti-doped NaTaO3 at 300 degrees C-700 degrees C was measured with electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) under dry and wet O-2 atmospheres.
Titulo: Conduction properties of Ti-doped NaTaO3 at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: Ti-doped NaTaO3 samples have higher conductivity in the wet atmosphere than in the dry atmosphere, reaching 3 x 10(-4) S/cm at 700 degrees C (10% Ti-doped NaTaO3), which confirms the hydration and proton conduction in Ti-doped NaTaO3.
Titulo: Conduction properties of Ti-doped NaTaO3 at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: Through the investigation on the dependence of conductivity on oxygen partial pressure, hole conduction in an oxidizing atmosphere, and electron conduction in reducing atmosphere can be verified.
Titulo: Conduction properties of Ti-doped NaTaO3 at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: Na+ conduction was proven to be negligible with direct current polarization.
Titulo: Conduction properties of Ti-doped NaTaO3 at intermediate temperature
